title: Telecommunications 2000: who cares?
brief_description: Shows aspects of the work of the National Telecommunications Planning Branch of Telecom Australia, which culminated in the publication of their report ‘Telecom 2000’. Depicts the reaction of people faced with forecasts of rapid changes in telecommunications technology, and explores the dilemmas facing the provider of telecommunications if he wishes to seriously meet real social needs.
